cause.description:
Pescetarians eat no meat (chicken, pork, ham, etc.). So, why not just be a vegetarian? Aren't they the same thing? Nope. Pescetarians don't eat land animals. But they do eat fish and other seafoods. Yay!
1. Animals need to be saved, but sushi is too good to give up.
cause.mission: Save all animals (except fish...sushi is too good)!
cause.name: Pescetarianism
